Best Dehumidifiers Recommended by Consumer Reports – Buying Guide

You are here: Home / Appliances / Best Dehumidifiers Recommended by Consumer Reports – Buying Guide

August 14, 2024 By Paolo Roxas
Categories: Appliances

The best dehumidifiers can help you combat the damp or muggy feel of most spaces in your home. This includes the most moisture-prone areas like basements and crawlspaces. There is also a sea of options out there, but thankfully, Consumer Reports already did the homework for you.

The brand rigorously and scientifically tests thousands of products and passes them through very specific categories of results. These compound into a recommendation score that gives you a product that will satisfy and effectively serve its purpose. Heeding CR’s recommendations most of the time will save you a lot of money and headaches.

Why Trust Consumer Reports

Consumer Reports is a top name for stringent testing and reviews. They designed a lab-grade and controlled setup for this product type to ensure that each unit’s capabilities are measured in a tangible manner. CR’s team assesses the following characteristics to give you the best recommendation:

Humidistat Accuracy—Each best dehumidifier is tested to determine whether it can reach or maintain a set humidity level.

Water Removal – CR measures each model’s ability to remove moisture and compares it against the manufacturer’s claims in a controlled test chamber.

Reliability and Satisfaction – CR asks its members who have specific dehumidifiers to check how it has performed or how long it lasted for them.

Convenience – Ease of use is a must-have for any Consumer Reports recommendation across all the categories it tests.

Efficiency – Energy efficiency is equally as important to owners simply because it will help them lower the total cost of ownership.

Noise – Many of these products that handle air can be noisy, and it can become an annoyance if CR recommends a less stealthy option.

Consumer Reports tested more than fifty different models for this roundup to ensure that they provide the best picks out there. Only the top half scored greatly, meaning they are the ones that are truly effective at removing moisture. The group is further cut down by how each one performs in the categories above, filtering out the middling offerings and leaving only the cream of the crop.

CR’s long-standing name in this game guarantees authentic results, especially since none of the products are sponsored or provided for free. The company buys its products off the shelf, which ensures that the test item isn’t cherry-picked or modified for top marks.

Best Dehumidifiers 2024

The best dehumidifiers come in varying sizes or capacities, ranging between 20 pints per day all the way up to 50. Smaller variants are great for individual rooms and silence, but a high-capacity alternative will dry the air faster in larger area of your house. Price may also be a factor, but buying a smaller unit means that you will need another one at some point.

Honeywell TP70WKN (83) – Best Large Capacity Humidifier (40+ Pints)

Buy Now from Amazon

The Honeywell TP70WKN is a strong candidate based on its results in every category listed for the test. It removes 50 pints per day, although its tank only holds up to 13. You can divert it to a drain while enjoying its quiet and effective operation, which Consumer Reports members loved about it.

Midea MAD35S1QWT (92) – Best Medium Capacity Dehumidifier (30+ Pints)

Buy Now from Amazon

The Midea MAD35S1QWT is the highest scorer in the Consumer Report’s dehumidifier roundup. It can handle up to 35 pints of moisture while being energy efficient and reasonably quiet for its size. It also has a timer, a built-in pump, and a digital display to make operation more convenient.

Midea MAD20S1QWT (87) – Best Small Capacity Dehumidifier (20+ Pints)

Buy Now from Amazon

The Midea MAD20S1QWT is your best bet if you require absolute silence. Its humidistat is one of the most accurate, so it’s a perfect choice for accurate humidity controls for any room. It is also energy-saving, plus it has smart power features that turn the machine on automatically and reload the previous settings that were put into it.

TCL TDW20E20 (78) – Small Capacity Dehumidifier Runner Up (20+ Pints)

Buy Now from Amazon

The TCL TDW20E20 is another compact choice you can consider if excellent water removal is your priority. It’s not the quietest, but it’s decent and accurate enough to be effective and unnoticed in a corner. One downside is its 7-pint tank, which will need to be emptied often.

Homelabs HME020030N (75) – Small Capacity Dehumidifier 3rd Place (20+ Pints)

Buy Now from Amazon

The Homelabs HME020030N is another strong contender for quiet operation and vigor in removing moisture. It’s more accurate than the other small humidifiers, but it’s the least energy-efficient of the lot. You also have to deal with a 7-pint tank, but it’s manageable if you get top-end performance.

Frigidaire FFAD2233W1 (75) – Small Capacity Dehumidifier Honorable Mention (20+ Pints)

The Frigidaire FFAD2233W1 isn’t the most accurate, but it can remove the most moisture at 22 pints in its size category. Its tank is also larger at 12 pounds, so it should work longer than the other options. It’s a basic model, but you can add a digital hygrometer for cheap if you wanted to measure humidity and maintain levels of it during the day.
